amendment.description: Amendment gives distant water tuna vessels in the Western Pacific Ocean the option of using Guam as their required port of call in order to meet U.S. maritime regulations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-267 to give distant water tuna vessels in the Western Pacific Ocean the option of using Guam as their required port of call in order to meet U.S. maritime regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Napolitano amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 364 - 37 (Roll no. 834).
